item.description: Meet Libertarians near you! Come to a local Libertarian Meetup to share your opinions on today's political climate and issues and learn how you can contribute to America's political future. Everyone interested in Libertarianism is welcome! This group is mostly intended for people in the greater Lowell / Route 3 / 495 area, but all are welcome. If Boston is easier for you, check out the Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group at <http://libertarian.meetup.com/349/>
item.name: The Route 495 Area Libertarian Meetup
